name: Alice Verhoeven
facts: Volunteers at a local bird sanctuary.
Keeps a diary and hasn’t missed a day in 15 years.

name: Marko Jensen
facts: Still rides 40 km every Saturday.
Restores antique clocks as a hobby.

name: Sophia Liu
facts: Published a book of short stories at age 59.
Learned to paint with watercolors during retirement.

name: Jonas Klein
facts: Can still solve a Rubik’s Cube in under a minute.
Worked as a photographer for 40 years.

name: Emma van Dijk
facts: Has never owned a smartphone.
Maintains a small rooftop vegetable garden.

name: Daniel Okafor
facts: Plays piano for a community choir.
Once took a solo backpacking trip at age 62.

name: Julia Romero
facts: Can recall every country she has visited (34 total).
Used to perform magic tricks at children’s hospitals.

name: Ivan Petrov
facts: Builds custom mechanical keyboards as a retirement hobby.
Keeps bees and produces his own honey.

name: Chloe Andersen
facts: Can still recite π to 150 digits.
Recently adopted an elderly rescue dog.

name: Matteo Ricci
facts: Builds handcrafted wooden chairs in his workshop.
Got lost in Tokyo in the 1980s during a business trip.
